name: MetaMasterSEO
author: Weblogix Software Team

sections.description:
Meta Master SEO is a comprehensive WordPress plugin designed to help website owners optimize their content for search engines. It provides advanced features such as meta data management, real-time content analysis, social media previews, and integration with Google, Bing, and other verification services. With an intuitive user interface and powerful SEO tools, Meta Master SEO ensures your website ranks higher in search engine results.

Features

  • Meta Title & Description Management: Easily add and edit meta titles and descriptions for posts, pages, and custom post types.
  • Real-time Content Analyzer: Analyze the length and quality of your meta titles, descriptions, and focus keyphrases.
  • Social Media Integration: Configure Open Graph meta tags for Facebook and Twitter, including title, description, and images.
  • Google & Bing Verification: Easily verify your website with Google and Bing using their respective verification codes.
  • Sitemap Generation: Automatically generate a sitemap for your website, including custom post types.
  • Custom Slugs: Edit and customize the slugs of your pages for better URL optimization.
  • NoFollow & Follow Links Control: Configure whether links on individual pages should be followed by search engines.
  • Bing URL Submission: Directly submit your URLs to Bing’s Webmaster Tools for faster indexing.
  • API Integration for Bing: Allows you to submit multiple URLs directly to Bing using an API key.
  • Content Previews: Get a visual preview of how your content will look on Google, Facebook, and Twitter.

How to Use

  • Install the Plugin: Upload the Meta Master SEO plugin via WordPress admin or FTP. Activate the plugin from the Plugins page.
  • Access SEO Settings: Navigate to the WordPress Dashboard. Go to SEO > Meta Master SEO to access the plugin settings.
    Configure General SEO Settings: Set your site-wide meta title, description, and keywords. Add Google, Bing, and Yandex verification codes. Configure custom slugs and breadcrumbs titles for your pages and posts.
  • Manage SEO for Individual Posts & Pages: In the post or page editor, find the Meta Master SEO Settings box. Add meta titles, descriptions, and focus keyphrases. Customize social media preview titles, descriptions, and images for Facebook and Twitter.
  • Generate a Sitemap: From the Meta Master SEO settings, enable sitemap generation and select which post types to include.
  • Submit URLs to Bing: Go to the Bing URL Submission tab within Meta Master SEO settings. Add your Bing Webmaster API key and submit URLs for faster indexing by Bing.
  • Real-Time Content Analyzer: The content analyzer will automatically review the meta title and description length. Evaluate the presence of focus keyphrases in real-time.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later.

Author

  • Author: Weblogix Soft Team
  • Author URL: https://weblogixsoft.com
  • Plugin URL: https://weblogixsoft.com/metamasterseo
sections.installation:
1. Upload the metamaster-seo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure the plugin settings via the ‘MetaMasterSEO’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I use MetaMasterSEO?

After activating the plugin, you can access the MetaMasterSEO settings via the ‘MetaMasterSEO’ menu in WordPress. Here you can configure default meta tags, social media settings, and more.

Can I import data from other SEO plugins?

Yes, MetaMasterSEO allows you to import data from popular SEO plugins like Yoast SEO, Rank Math, and All in One SEO.

How do I submit multiple URLs to Bing?

You can submit multiple URLs by navigating to SEO > Meta Master SEO > Bing URL Submission. Enter your Bing API key and the URLs you wish to submit, one per line.

Can I edit SEO metadata for custom post types?

Yes, Meta Master SEO automatically supports all public post types. You can edit meta titles, descriptions, and keyphrases for custom post types.

How do I enable sitemap generation?

Go to SEO > Meta Master SEO and click on the Sitemap tab. Enable the sitemap generation option and choose which post types to include in the sitemap.

How do I preview how my content will appear on social media?

In the post or page editor, you can add Facebook and Twitter meta tags (title, description, image). You will see a live preview of how the content will appear on both platforms.

Is Meta Master SEO compatible with WooCommerce?

Yes, Meta Master SEO works with WooCommerce and supports SEO optimization for products and product categories.

How do I verify my website with Google and Bing?

Simply go to the Verification tab in Meta Master SEO settings. Enter the verification codes provided by Google and Bing in their respective fields.

short_description: MetaMasterSEO is a comprehensive SEO plugin for WordPress. It allows you to add meta tags, social media previews, and more to your posts and pages.
